metadata.synopsis: Balthazar casts a resurrection spell on a zombie while in combat after the Audience Route in the Colony.For help with Latin, contact either Tom Ryckeboer or Ilya Voulis.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe Necromancer_Audience"- Stay inside the cages.- Wait for the Necromancer's turn in combat, he will send a zombie to light the candles.- Wait for the Necromancer's next turn - he will start resurrecting the nearby NPCs and turn them into zombies.
